name: Paribesh Unnayan Parishad
briefDescription: Paribesh Unnayan Parishad is serving the community at Ckimate prone areas ( Sundarban, particlarly, at Sagar Island & Patharpratima) by providing climate resilient livelihood options ( salt tolerant paddy & veg. seeds), Integrated Farming system, organic farming with Veg. & traditional paddy varieties and relevant education for children.
